    • Method Detail

      • checkLogin

        public boolean checkLogin(java.lang.String username,
                 java.lang.String password)
        This method checks the database for possible matching username and password combinations and returns true if it finds false, otherwise
        Parameters:
        username - the username inputed into the text field
        password - the password inputed into password field
        Returns:
        whether or not the username and password combination was found

      • findPlayer

        public boolean findPlayer(java.lang.String username)
        findPlayer searches the database for a username matching the one entered by the player.
        Parameters:
        username - the username inputted by the player
        Returns:
        true if it finds a matching entry in the database, false otherwise

      • createPlayer

        public boolean createPlayer(java.lang.String newUsername,
                   java.lang.String newPassword,
                   java.lang.String securityQuestion,
                   java.lang.String securityAnswer)
        createPlayer creates a new entry in the database with the information passed through its parameters. It will also autoset the level achieved field to 1.
        Parameters:
        newUsername - player inputted Username
        newPassword - player inputted Password
        securityQuestion - player inputted Security Question
        securityAnswer - player inputted Answer to
        Returns:
        true if an entry has been created, false otherwise
